org.vaadin.addons.lazyquerycontainer

Interface QueryView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LazyQueryView

    public interface QueryView
    Interface for sorting and browsing data from a business service.
    Author:
    Tommi S.E. Laukkanen

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Adds filter to container.

      • getQueryDefinition

        QueryDefinition getQueryDefinition()
        Returns the definition of properties provided by this view.
        Returns:
        the query definition

        Gets list of item IDs present in this view.

        Returns:
        the maxCacheSize

        void setMaxCacheSize(int maxCacheSize)
        Parameters:
        maxCacheSize - the maxCacheSize to set

      • sort

        void sort(Object[] sortPropertyIds,
        boolean[] ascendingStates)
        Sorts the items according to the provided sort state.
        Parameters:
        sortPropertyIds - Properties participating in the sorting.
        ascendingStates - List of sort order for the properties.

      • refresh

        void refresh()
        Refreshes data from business service and notifies listeners of changed item set.

      • size

        int size()
        Returns the number of items currently available through the view.
        Returns:
        Number of items available.

      • getItem

        com.vaadin.data.Item getItem(int index)
        Gets item at the given index.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the item.
        Returns:
        The item identified by the index.

      • addItem

        int addItem()
        Adds a new item to the end of the query result set.
        Returns:
        The index of the new item.

      • removeItem

        void removeItem(int index)
        Removes item at given index.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of the Item to be removed.

      • removeAllItems

        void removeAllItems()
        Removes all items.

      • isModified

        boolean isModified()
        Check if query view contains modifications.
        Returns:
        true if query has been modified.

      • commit

        void commit()
        Saves changes. Refresh has to be invoked after this method to clear the cache.

      • discard

        void discard()
        Cancels changes. Refresh has to be invoked after this method to clear the cache.

      • getAddedItems

        List<com.vaadin.data.Item> getAddedItems()
        Get list of added buffered items.
        Returns:
        list of added buffered items

      • getModifiedItems

        List<com.vaadin.data.Item> getModifiedItems()
        Get list of modified buffered items.
        Returns:
        list of modified buffered items

        List<com.vaadin.data.Item> getRemovedItems()
        Get list of removed buffered items.
        Returns:
        list of removed buffered items

      • addFilter

        void addFilter(com.vaadin.data.Container.Filter filter)
        Adds filter to container.
        Parameters:
        filter - the default filter to add

      • removeFilter

        void removeFilter(com.vaadin.data.Container.Filter filter)
        Removes filter to container.
        Parameters:
        filter - the default filter to add

      • removeFilters

        void removeFilters()
        Clears filters from container.
